owl:Ontology.dc:title: The Plucky Ontology
owl:Ontology.dc:description: An example ontology written for the purpose of describing ideas and events related to historical circumnavigation.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: The type of object or entity being described
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of all entity types.

owl:Class: <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://www.semanticweb.org/plucky#is_entity_type/> Persons Entities that are persons, also known as human beings.

<rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://www.semanticweb.org/plucky#is_entity_type/> Places A particular position, point, or area in space; a location. Usually refers to towns, cities, countries or continents.
